Package ssms.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControllerMapping
    Stores information on how to interpret game controller signals.
    ControllerMapping.AxisOrButton
    Container that holds information for two exclusive or functionalities.
    EveryFrameCombatPlugin_Controller
    Handles all controls for combat via game controller.
    EveryFrameCombatPlugin_Controller.PlayerShipCache
    Preserves per ship settings during combat.
    EveryFrameCombatPlugin_Controller.Targeting
    Preserves the targeting selection state.
    HandlerController
    Provides abstracted access to a game controller based on a ControllerMapping.
    MineStrikeStatsFixed
    When looking up the AI flag SYSTEM_TARGET_COORDS the original code only uses it if the associated ship has an AI.
    SSMSControllerModPlugin
    Sets up configuration and application scoped persistency for the mod.
